recipe.title: Smoked Fish with Fennel and Arugula Salad
ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds thinly sliced smoked fish (such as sable, trout, or whitefish)
1 fresh fennel bulb, trimmed, halved vertically, cored, sliced paper-thin
instructions: Overlap fish on one side of platter. Whisk oil and lemon juice in bowl. Season dressing with salt and pepper. Toss half with fennel and half with arugula. Mound both alongside fish. Sprinkle with chives.
